member.name: M:Minesweeper.DrawMap.#ctor(Minesweeper.GameMap,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This is class creates the graphics for the game map. It draws its changes onto a bitmap that is the picture that the user sees as the game.
member.param: This parameter is the object that created an instance of this class. It is needed so that we can send it the updated bitmap to display it.
This parameter is the number of columns that the object that the sender has. This will be used to help us calculate the size of the map as well as for iterating through loops.
This parameter is the number of rows that the object that the sender has. This will be used to help us calculate the size of the map as well as for iterating through loops.
This parameter is the mine size that the object that the sender has. This will be used to help us calculate the size of the map as well.

member.name: M:Minesweeper.DrawMap.getMapHeight
member.summary: This Method is used to get the map height in pixels
member.returns: This method returns the height of the game map in pixels

member.name: M:Minesweeper.DrawMap.getMapWidth
member.summary: This Method is used to get the map width in pixels
member.returns: This method returns the width of the game map in pixels

member.name: M:Minesweeper.DrawMap.InitializeVariables
member.summary: This method initializes the variable used in this class. It also calculates the map width and the map height.

member.name: M:Minesweeper.DrawMap.InitialDraw
member.summary: This method draws a map of all initial mine spaces. It has the diminsions that are sent in to the constructor.

member.name: M:Minesweeper.DrawMap.FillRectangle(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Brush)
member.summary: This method draws a rectangle at the position defined by the position of the columnIndex and rowIndex parameters. It draws the rectangle with the brush that comes in as a parameter.
member.param: This parameter defines the column location of the rectangle.
This parameter defines the row location of the rectangle.
This parameter defines the brush to be used to draw the rectangle.

member.name: M:Minesweeper.DrawMap.DrawBitmap(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: This method draws a bitmap at the position defined by the position of the columnIndex and rowIndex parameters.
member.param: This parameter defines the column location to draw the bitmap.
This parameter defines the row location to draw the bitmap.
This parameter defines which bitmap to draw.

member.name: M:Minesweeper.DrawMap.RefreshScreen
member.summary: This method outputs to the screen the updated bitmap inside the bitmap container which is a picture box.

member.name: M:Minesweeper.DrawMap.DrawString(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method draws a string at the position defined by the position of the columnIndex and rowIndex parameters. It draws it in a predefined font with a black color.
member.param: This parameter defines the string to be displayed to the screen
This parameter defines the column location to draw the string.
This parameter defines the row location to draw the string.

member.summary: This method creates an instance of the GameMap class from a load.
member.param: This is the number of columns that the new map will have.
This is the number of rows that the new map will have.
This is a two diminsional array of bool that describes if there is a mine at the current position of the array. A value of 1 means that the array contains a mine.
This is a two diminsional array of an enum. The enum represents the current state of a mine space that is denoted by the column and row index.
